common.defaultErrorMessage: An error occurred during your request. Please try again later or contact the administrator.

messages.badCredentials: Could not log you in. Please check your credentials.
messages.tokenRefreshFailed: Could not refresh your access token.

common.passwordMustBeLonger: Password must be at least {{char}} characters

login.title: Log in to TripPlanner
login.subtitle: You just have to enter the usual stuff

signup.title: Sign up for TripPlanner
signup.subtitle: By just filling in the form below

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address below, and click send to receive further instructions on how to reset your password.

resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.subtitle: Please choose a new password below.

messages.emailRegistered: It seems that this email is already registered.
messages.signupSuccess: Thank you! You can now log in with your credentials.
messages.fetchFailed: Could not fetch your user data.
messages.passwordResetEmailNotSent: Could not send the password reset email. Please try again later or contact us.
messages.passwordResetEmailSent: Please check your inbox for the password reset email!
messages.resetPasswordFailed: Could not update your password. Please try again or contact us.
messages.resetPasswordSuccess: New password saved. Now you can log in with your new credentials!
messages.deleteAccountFailed: Could not delete your account. Please try again or contact us.
messages.deleteAccountSuccess: Account deleted. Sorry to see you go... :(

filters.searchPlaceholder: Search for title, country or year

myTrips.noTripsFound: Sorry, no trips found. Try changing the search criteria or create a new trip!

editTripDialog.createNewSubtitle: Choose a title, add some countries, upload a cover image and set the dates for your trip.
editTripDialog.editSubtitle: You can only change the title, countries and the cover image here. If you would modify the dates, please do so in the editor.
editTripDialog.title: Trip title
editTripDialog.titleLength: Title must be between 3 and 50 characters
editTripDialog.countriesHint: Enter country names separated by a comma
editTripDialog.countriesRequired: Please add at least one country

duplicateTripDialog.dialogSubtitle: Clone your trip in case you want to make different plans. (Please note that the cover image will not be copied.)
duplicateTripDialog.title: Trip title
duplicateTripDialog.titleLength: Title must be between 3 and 50 characters

messages.tripDeleteError: Could not delete your trip. Please try again later or contact us.
messages.tripUpdateError: Could not update your trip. Please try again later or contact us.
messages.deleteConfirmBody: Do you really want to delete the trip '{{title}}'?

imageUploader.dragOrClick: Drag an image here or click upload
imageUploader.invalidType: Invalid file type, only jpg and png are allowed.
imageUploader.invalidSize: The file must not be larger than {{maxSize}}MB.
imageUploader.invalidDimensions: The image must be minimum {{minWidth}}x{{minHeight}} pixels.

changePassword.title: Change your password
changePassword.subtitle: Please choose a new password below.
changePassword.passwordMustBeLonger: Password must be at least {{char}} characters
